name: Dramatic statement cuff and ring set
description:
This bold set is all handmade and cut, the wires have been hammered , the base of the cuff features a thick aluminum sheet that holds a crystal bead and all around there are squared hammered swirls. 

made of compressed aluminum wire, this material is way harder that regular aluminum, rust and allergy free, mimics the look of old sterling.

________________

ships via first class and tracking. 

USPS.

I can adjust all of my rings,, just contact me with your size.

name: Big nested wire ring
description:
All of my rings are adjustable to any size, this ring is size 9 just convo me if you need it resized...

This is a big ring, it is made of 17g compressed silver aluminum wire, and features a loose wrap 
nesting a flat circle glass bead in lavender color. 

average of 60 mm long and wide.

__________________________________________---

Shipping

Interested in my other listings? After your purchase, just let me know that you're still shopping ... I love to combine shipping!!!
I ship via U.S. Postal Service within 1 or 3 days after payment is received. 
I use delivery confirmation on every package.
All of my listings can be shipped via Priority. It only takes 3 days to arrive and it is very reliable!!!
Anything under 12 ounces can ship via First Class. This service takes around a week to arrive.

name: abstract cuff
description:
The cuff features an abstract design, a rainbow crystal is caged at the center of the cuff, made of compressed aluminum wire in silver tone. 

easily adjusts to any size.

name: Art wire cuff and big bold ring
description:
All of my jewelry is adjustable , the ring on this set is size 10 but can be adjusted to any size, the cuff is also adjustable. The set is made in 17 g compressed aluminum wire, silver toned. Aluminum is light weight and durable, it also mimics sterling. 

This set features 2 clear mustard glass beads i call it my yolk set:) because it kind of looks like egg yolks.. The ring has an intricate wrapp that holds in place all of the wire ends that i waved and turned all by hand. 

Ring
size 10 - adjustable to any size

55mm by 50 mm by 35 mm high

cuff 

features 2 half a yolk designs 80 mm long by 60 mm wide


please contact me if you have any other questions, thanks

name: Ring-surprised eye with blue eye shadow- aluminum wire art ring
description:
The ring is sie 7 and is made o compressed aluminum wire all the ends have been sanded and hammered. At he center there is a flat faceted champagne glass bead, and the small blue pebble is shell.

This ring was inspired after a 70's episode o a scary movie:)... i know silly.. lol. i just loved the surprised eyes o the actress with this huge eye lashes,, lol,, i couln't resist.

please contact me if you have any other questions.

*115 mm at it's widest and 75 cm at it's longest.

sie 7 adjustable one size up or down.
